data.comment: In the minute -3, Luis Neto (Sporting) has been booked during the half time break!
The big names in today's match at Jose Alvalade have now been confirmed.
Sporting kick-off to get the first-half underway.
In the minute 1, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Porto close to the penalty box.
Porto have been awarded a corner by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho.
Throw-in for Sporting in the half of Porto.
In the minute 3, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Porto throw-in in Sporting's half.
Free kick for Porto in the half of Sporting.
Sporting needs to be cautious. Porto have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 6, Can Porto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sporting's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sporting have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 8, Sporting to take a throw-in in Porto territory.
Pedro Goncalves for Sporting drives towards goal at Jose Alvalade. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Sporting.
In the minute 8, Can Sporting get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Porto's half?
Nuno Santos scores to make it 1-0 at Jose Alvalade.
Sporting awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 11, Important block from the Porto defence as Pedro Porro fires in a strike for Sporting.
Porto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pedro Goncalves for Sporting has been booked by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Sporting in the half of Porto.
Throw-in Porto.
Ball safe as Porto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 13, Porto attack but Mateus Uribe's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Sporting at Jose Alvalade.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Porto in their own half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
In the minute 18, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Sporting.
Jesus Corona is booked for the away team.
In the minute 20, At Jose Alvalade, Zaidu Sanusi has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Porto awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 23, Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
Sporting to take a throw-in in Porto territory.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Sporting throw-in in Porto's half.
In the minute 25, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
Goal! Porto go level at 1-1 through Mateus Uribe in Lisbon.
That's a fine assist from Zaidu Sanusi.
In the minute 27, It's a goal kick for the home team in Lisbon.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a throw-in for Porto, close to Sporting's area.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Sporting throw-in in Porto's half.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Porto at Jose Alvalade.
Ball safe as Sporting is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Porto.
In the minute 31, Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Sporting.
Free kick for Porto in their own half.
In the minute 33, In Lisbon Porto drive forward through Luis Diaz. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Lisbon to check on Jesus Corona, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 34, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Nuno Mendes.
Jovane Cabral for the home team is judged to be offside.
Nuno Mendes is back on his feet again.
In the minute 36, Porto's Jesus Corona looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Throw-in high up the field for Sporting in Lisbon.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 37, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Sporting.
Can Porto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sporting's half?
Free kick for Porto in the half of Sporting.
In the minute 39, Porto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Porto to take a throw-in in Sporting territory.
Throw-in for Porto at Jose Alvalade.
In the minute 41, In Lisbon Porto's Moussa Marega is caught offside.
Porto push forward at Jose Alvalade and Luis Diaz gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sporting defence.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 44, Sporting to take a throw-in in Porto territory.
Corner awarded to Sporting.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Sporting.
The first-half has come to a close in Lisbon.
Goal! Porto have got their heads in front thanks to a Jesus Corona strike.
In the minute 45, Great play from Luis Diaz to set up the goal.
It's Porto with the kick-off after the break.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
In the minute 47, Ball goes out of play for a Porto goal kick.
Pedro Goncalves (Sporting) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Sporting have been awarded a corner by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho.
In the minute 48, Sporting are coming forward and Nuno Mendes gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Porto have a goal kick.
Can Sporting capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Porto's half?
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Porto in their own half.
Sporting awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 52, Corner awarded to Sporting.
Pedro Goncalves (Sporting) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Sporting close to the penalty box.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Porto in their own half.
Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
Otavio (Porto) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 55, Porto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho blows against Sporting's Pedro Goncalves for offside.
In the minute 56, Moussa Marega of Porto is pulled up for offside.
Ruben Amorim (Sporting) is making a first substitution, with Luciano Vietto replacing Jovane Cabral.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards Sporting a goal kick.
Can Porto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sporting's half?
In the minute 58, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Porto throw-in in Sporting's half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
The away team replace Luis Diaz with Felipe Anderson.
In the minute 59, Sergio Conceicao is making the team's second substitution at Jose Alvalade with Toni Martinez replacing Moussa Marega.
Goal kick for Porto at Jose Alvalade.
Nuno Santos is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 61, Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Sporting's Zouhair Feddal has been booked in Lisbon.
In the minute 62, Sporting make their second substitution with Gonzalo Plata replacing Luis Neto.
The home team has substituted Nuno Santos with Tiago Tomas. Ruben Amorim is thus making his third change.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Porto.
In the minute 64, Porto's Sergio Oliveira gets in a shot on goal at Jose Alvalade. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Porto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sporting are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Porto in the half of Sporting.
Throw-in for Sporting in their own half.
Throw-in Porto.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Sporting at Jose Alvalade.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Porto throw-in in Sporting's half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 69, Ball safe as Sporting is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Porto goal kick.
In the minute 70, Porto's Jesus Corona is whistled for offside at Jose Alvalade.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards Porto a goal kick.
Sporting to take a throw-in in Porto territory.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Sporting in the half of Porto.
Can Sporting get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Porto's half?
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a throw-in for Sporting, close to Porto's area.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Porto at Jose Alvalade.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Porto in their own half.
Ball safe as Porto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 75, Sporting's Pedro Porro misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
Romario Baro is replacing Otavio for the away team.
In the minute 76, Nanu is on a sub for Wilson Manafa for Porto.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
In the minute 77, Andraz Sporar is on a sub for Pedro Porro for Sporting.
In the minute 78, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Porto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Luciano Vietto (Sporting) has received a yellow card from Luis Miguel Branco Godinho.
The home team replace Matheus Nunes with Joao Mario.
In the minute 79, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Porto throw-in in Sporting's half.
Throw-in for Porto in the half of Sporting.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Porto just outside Sporting's area.
Sebastian Coates (Sporting) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Sporting get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Porto's half?
In the minute 83, Sporting to take a throw-in in Porto territory.
Joao Palhinha for Sporting gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Porto have a goal kick.
In the minute 84, Throw-in Sporting.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
Can Sporting capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Porto's half?
In the minute 86, Porto have a goal kick.
Free kick for Porto in the half of Sporting.
Agustin Marchesin (Porto) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 87, Goal! Luciano Vietto levels the match at 2-2.
In Lisbon, Luciano Vietto (Sporting) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Porto in their own half.
Sporting awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Sporting!
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Lisbon.
Joao Palhinha (Sporting) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards Porto a goal kick.
In Lisbon Porto attack through Mehdi Taremi. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Sporting goal kick.
Sporting have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Sporting in Lisbon.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The match is over. Final score 2-2.
Mehdi Taremi is replacing Mateus Uribe for Porto at Jose Alvalade.
